page.title: 02SHAWHEAD PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content:
In Shawhead School there are 64 pupils aged between 4 and 12 years in classes Primary 1 to Primary 7. There are three classrooms and three ordinary teachers. There is one cook and one lady who helps the cook and tidies up the school at night. We also have other teachers like our gym teacher, our art teacher and our Health Visitor.
We have a big playground and a big playing field. My dad made the playground and helped to build the school as well with his digger.
At break the boys play football most of the time. We play lots of other games like Fifty Buzz, Catchy, British Bulldog, Kingsey and so on.
